title: 76. How Codependency Affects the way you view yourself done
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about how codependency affects the way you view yourself. Codependency impacts your ability to love yourself and to see yourself as worthy. You will NOT want to miss this episode. Tune in to hear more!

Click here to get your FREE copy of my Anatomy of Self Love workbook


Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
